data.text: @RLamondo LMFAO and here we have another bright bulb. Don’t you find it interesting that a google image search of this chart comes back with nothing other than 5 days ago on a Chinese owned site?  Nice job gullible roger, i wonder, do you still think trump is president?
@GJCNewYork @KatKatsebo Tell me then - which of my statements is incorrect?
@RLamondo @GJCNewYork Typical of most people these days. Bending data to suit what they believe, it’s pathetic
@RLamondo @KatKatsebo You are giving incomplete and misleading information.

@GJCNewYork @KatKatsebo Just keep changing your story until you find the one you want to prosecute. My tweet says that 1) people still catch it after vax 2) people still get sick from it after vax 3) people still die from it after vax. Everything else is in your mind.

@RLamondo @KatKatsebo Even with 56% of the population with a third dose of the vaxx means 44% with no protection against Omicron, an more transmissible  strain of the virus than the original.  That chart without a context and more data is not reliable for the conclusions you want to draw.

@GJCNewYork @KatKatsebo Please do some basic research on the statistical merit of the Pfizer trails. Start with the British Medical Journal and what they had to say about the trails, then look at the difference between ARR and RRR and decide for yourself whether you think the trails showed those results
@GJCNewYork @KatKatsebo "the great majority never received a third dose" Actually 56% of the UK population have received a 3rd dose. https://t.co/yhIDCrCinb

@KatKatsebo @RLamondo The data ( from HSA) shows that the great majority of people never received the third dose of the vaxx so they are not protected against Omicron and that is why you see the numbers in the chart. The chart does not show the full picture of what's happening.
https://t.co/pkZGOLJR0g

@RLamondo @KatKatsebo When vaccines were initially developed and tested, the data provided clearly showed that the vaccines were somewhere between 90% and 95% effective. This means you can get the disease and die from it even if vaccinated, with a high probability of getting protected 
 by the vax.
